languages.text: "Твоя трусливая манера боя вызывает лишь презрение. Даже не будь вы нелюдьми, столь робкая раса все равно не имела бы права на выживание".
"Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."
languages.original_text: "Твоя трусливая манера боя вызывает лишь презрение. Даже не будь вы нелюдьми, столь робкая раса все равно не имела бы права на выживание".

traits.locale_text: "Your cowardly style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not inhumans, such a timid race would still have no right to survive."
"Your cowardly style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not inhumans, such a timid race would still have no right to survive."
"Your cowardly style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not inhumans, such a timid race would still have no right to survive."
"Your cowardly style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not inhumans, such a timid race would still have no right to survive."

languages.text: “我看不起你这种战斗方式。即使你不是异形，如此贪生怕死的种族也不配享有活下去的权利。”
languages.original_text: "Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."

traits.locale_text: “我看不起你这种贪生怕死的战斗方式。即使你不是异形，如此懦弱的种族也不应享有生存的权利。”

languages.text: « Votre style de combat ne mérite rien d'autre que le mépris. Même si vous n'étiez pas des xénos, une race aussi lâche n'aurait aucun droit de survivre. »
languages.original_text: "Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."

traits.locale_text: « Votre style de combat est tellement lâche qu'il ne mérite rien d'autre que le mépris. Même si vous n'étiez pas des inhumains, votre race n'aurait aucun droit de survivre. »

languages.text: "Euer Kampfstil verdient nichts als Verachtung. Selbst, wenn Ihr kein Xenos wärt, hätte eine derart feige Spezies kein Recht zu überleben."
languages.original_text: "Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."

traits.locale_text: "Euer feiger Kampfstil verdient nichts als Verachtung. Selbst, wenn Ihr nicht unmenschlich wäret, hätte eine derart schwache Spezies kein Recht zu überleben."

languages.text: 「あんたたちの戦い方は軽蔑に値する。たとえあんたたちが、異種族でなかったとしても、そのような臆病な種族に生き残る権利はない」
languages.original_text: "Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたたちの臆病な戦い方は軽蔑に値する。たとえあんたたちが人ならざるものでなかったとしても、そのような臆病な種族に生き残る権利はない」

languages.text: «Vuestro estilo de combate solo merece desprecio. Aunque no fuerais xenos, una raza tan cobarde seguiría sin merecer sobrevivir».
languages.original_text: "Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."

traits.locale_text: «Vuestro estilo cobarde de combate solo merece desprecio. Aunque no fuerais inhumanos, una raza tan tímida seguiría sin merecer sobrevivir».

languages.original_text: "Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."

languages.text: "Ödlekçe savaş tarzın tiksintiden başkasını hak etmiyor. Zeno olmasaydın bile böyle korkak bir ırkın yaşamaya hakkı yok."
languages.original_text: "Your style of combat deserves nothing but contempt. Even if you were not xenos, such a cowardly race would still have no right to survive."

traits.locale_text: "Ödlekçe savaş tarzın tiksintiden başkasını hak etmiyor. Zeno olmasaydın bile böyle korkak bir ırkın yaşamaya hakkı yok."
